column4: How do I use irc on the livecd? what is the application called?
x-chat, you have to install it through synaptic though (you can actually do that on a liveCD)
how to use pidgin? just go to applications->internet->pidgin  then hit add account, and create an irc account on irc.freenode.net
pretty sure it does, should be under applications->internet->pidgin
